definition: abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]

sentences.english: He has to draw spades first in order to make the contract.
sentences.chinese: 爲了完成定約墩數，他得先吊黑桃。

sentences.english: Multiplayer Spades, Backgammon, Hearts, Checkers, and Reversi.
sentences.chinese: 多玩家黑桃王，雙陸棋，紅心大戰，跳棋和翻轉棋。

sentences.english: My partner surprised me by leading with a spade.
sentences.chinese: 我的搭檔先出黑桃，使我感到喫驚。

sentences.english: Learn about the queen of spades in this free card playing video.
sentences.chinese: 在此免費學習卡播放視頻關於黑桃皇后。

sentences.english: How to play a hand of spades in this free card playing video.
sentences.chinese: 如何在這個自由發揮卡上的黑桃手玩視頻。

sentences.english: Only perfect defense could set four spades.
sentences.chinese: 只有出色的防守才能打宕四黑桃的定約。

sentences.english: LoveGame intuition play the cards with spades to start.
sentences.chinese: 愛情遊戲就是要憑直覺從黑桃玩起。

sentences.english: Learn about playing a hand in spades in this free card playing video.
sentences.chinese: 玩黑桃瞭解有關在這個自由卡手玩視頻。

sentences.english: Learn about keeping score in spades in this free card playing video.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解更多關於保持在這個自由玩視頻卡評分黑桃。

sentences.english: The Queen of Spades was written in 1833.
Learn about techniques for playing duplicates in spades in this free card playing video.
sentences.chinese: 有關演奏技巧在此免費學習卡重複播放視頻黑桃。

sentences.english: How to keep score in spades in this free card playing video.
sentences.chinese: 如何保持在這個自由玩視頻卡黑桃評分。

sentences.english: Learn about nil reversals in spades in this free card playing video.
sentences.chinese: 在此免費學習卡播放視頻約在黑桃無逆轉。

sentences.english: You must play a spade if you have one.
sentences.chinese: 你如果有黑桃牌，就必須打出來。

sentences.english: He jumped from 3 clubs to four spades.
sentences.chinese: 他從梅花3一下子跳叫到黑桃4。

sentences.english: We set them two tricks at four spades.
sentences.chinese: 我們使他們的四黑桃定約宕了兩墩。

definition: to draw a tile (at mahjong)/to play mahjong
to bid (bridge and similar card games)
